thread.title: Libra Lea are a hit on and off the court
thread.title_full: Libra Lea are a hit on and off the court

title: Libra Lea are a hit on and off the court
text: PUBLISHED: October 13, 2015 7:35 am LAST UPDATED: October 13, 2015 5:42 pm Libra Lea are a hit on and off the court Family and friend-orientated, with a sharp eye for success – that is the claim of Gornal-based netball club Libra Lea. A club on the up – members of Libra Lea line up, back row, from left: Sally Bromley, Katie George, Sarah Cook, Andrea Campbell-Jackson, Leanne Nicklin, Kaye Webb, Emily Priest, Lucy Percival, Holly Owen, Carla Treece, Kate Boswell. Front row: Megan Priest, Rachael Smith, Katy Blackwell, Kathryn Slater, Lisa Fleetwood, Nicola Dixon-Knight, Becki Burden and club mascot Igloo sitting on the ball.
